 PLEASE MAKE SURE NO SENSITIVE INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR
 SYSTEM IS EXPOSED WHEN SUBMITTING FEEDBACK!

 Repository Mirroring Tool (RMT) is an open-source project and we can make it
 even better with your help and feedback.

 When adding your feedback/bug please keep in mind:
   - This is not a support channel. If you have paid support from SUSE, go
     to https://scc.suse.com/support to open a support ticket.
   - When posting bugs/feedback here, there is no guarantee that the issue
     will be handled immediately.
   - Keep in mind that your feedback and all communication around it will be
     publicly accessible by anyone. Make sure that you don't expose any
     personal or private information.

-->
